task.title: Updating the TLS certificates on Docker

taskbody.prereq: Ensure that you have the certificate and private key to be used.

step.cmd: Run the following command to stop the Sametime services.
Copy the two files to the /keys folder where the Sametime is deployed.
Replace the cert.key and cert.crt files with the new certificate files.
step.info: The files are located in the installation_directory./sametime-config/web/keys/ directory. Where installation_directory is the Sametime installation directory.

info.note: These changes are lost if you delete or remove the sametime-config directory.

step.cmd: Run the following command to start the Sametime services and apply the changes.
